"Armageddon Incarnate":
"\"Stop the world transformation.\"
With that thought in mind, the party
raced to the bottom of Earth Guide HQ.
At the place where Phantoms gathered,
the Original Man awaited.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
